ctx: intros m x y n m1 y0 MAX H1 H2 H3.
intros m x y n m1 y0 MAX H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap x, y : dart n : nat m1 := L m one x y : fmap y0 := cA m zero y : dart MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 : nat H1 : inv_hmap m1 H2 : ~ expf m x y0 H3 : 1 <= MAX - n Unable to unify "let MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m (cA m zero y) in MF.degree_aux (L m one x y) x MAX = MAX" with "MF.degree_aux (L m one x y) x (MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 - n) = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m (cA m zero y)".

original: intros m x y n m1 y0 MAX H1 H2 H3. unfold m1, y0, MAX. intros H4 H5 H6. apply degree_L1_merge_MAX with (m:=m) (x:=x) (y:=y); auto.
